title: Kevin Hart is the victim! Girlfriend chops up boyfriend? Should Florida ban O.J.?
itunes:title: Kevin Hart is the victim! Girlfriend chops up boyfriend? Should Florida ban O.J.?
description:
Kevin Hart admits he made a mistake messing with a woman, but the comedian wants the FBI to arrest someone he claims tried to blackmail him with the video. Psycho-analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk join Nancy Grace to look at the story. A Texas woman is charged with shooting her boyfriend, chopping him up & dumping him in garbage. Grace, Tereszcuk, Dr. Marshall and crime expert Joseph Scott Morgan discuss the Cierra Sutton case. Nancy & guests also talk to publicist Ed Lozzi, who's pushing an effort to convince Florida's governor to ban O.J. Simpson from the Sunshine State for at least two months after his October release from a Nevada prison. Lozzi argues that Florida needs time to recover from Hurricane Irma before it has to deal with Simpson.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
